an7.19:4.1: * “Nibbāne sukhānupassī viharati sukhasaññī sukhapaṭisaṃvedī satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ cetasā adhimuccamāno paññāya pariyogāhamāno.
an7.19:4.4: Ayaṃ bhikkhave, paṭhamo puggalo āhuneyyo … pe …
an7.19:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo nibbāne sukhānupassī viharati sukhasaññī sukhapaṭisaṃvedī satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ cetasā adhimuccamāno paññāya pariyogāhamāno.
an7.19:5.2: Tassa apubbaṃ acarimaṃ āsavapariyādānañca hoti jīvitapariyādānañca.
an7.19:5.3: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, dutiyo puggalo āhuneyyo … pe …
an7.19:6.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo nibbāne sukhānupassī viharati sukhasaññī sukhapaṭisaṃvedī satataṃ samitaṃ abbokiṇṇaṃ cetasā adhimuccamāno paññāya pariyogāhamāno.
an7.19:6.2: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā antarāparinibbāyī hoti … pe …
an7.19:6.7: Ayaṃ, bhikkhave, sattamo puggalo āhuneyyo … pe …
an7.19:6.9: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta puggalā āhuneyyā … pe …
